## What Itzel will speak about:

Vondi shares her story about unhealed trauma which led to teenage pregnancy, domestic violence, drug addiction and  a prison sentence. She honors and acknowledges how surrendering her life to God was the beginning of her healing journey.Vondi hopes by sharing her experiences, a lost soul will be encouraged  to live a life of freedom!
